    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-14245 A vulnerability has been found in IdeaCMS up to 1.8. This affects the function whereRaw of the file ...</title>
      <description>A vulnerability has been found in IdeaCMS up to 1.8. This affects the function whereRaw of the file app/common/logic/index/Coupon.php. Such manipulation of the argument params leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 7.3 (HIGH)  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 13:15:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-14245</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-14245</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-42616 Some endpoints in vulnerability-lookup that modified 
application state (e.g. changing database entr...</title>
      <description>Some endpoints in vulnerability-lookup that modified 
application state (e.g. changing database entries, user data, 
configurations, or other privileged actions) may have been accessible 
via HTTP GET requests without requiring a CSRF token. This flaw leaves 
the application vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks
 an attacker who tricks a logged-in user into visiting a malicious 
website could cause the user’s browser to issue GET requests that 
perform unintended state-changing operations in the context of their 
authenticated session.


Because the server would treat these GET requests as valid (since no 
CSRF protection or POST method enforcement was in place), the attacker 
could exploit this to escalate privileges, change settings, or carry out
 other unauthorized actions without needing the user’s explicit consent 
or awareness. 
The fix ensures that all state-changing endpoints now require HTTP POST 
requests and include a valid CSRF token. This enforces that state 
changes cannot be triggered by arbitrary cross-site GET requests. This issue affects Vulnerability-Lookup before 2.18.0. | Severity UNKNOWN  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 13:15:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-42616</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-42616</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-42620 In affected versions, vulnerability-lookup handled user-controlled 
content in comments and bundles ...</title>
      <description>In affected versions, vulnerability-lookup handled user-controlled 
content in comments and bundles in an unsafe way, which could lead to 
stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).




On the backend, the related_vulnerabilities field of bundles accepted 
arbitrary strings without format validation or proper sanitization. On 
the frontend, comment and bundle descriptions were converted from 
Markdown to HTML and then injected directly into the DOM using string 
templates and innerHTML. This combination allowed an attacker who could 
create or edit comments or bundles to store crafted HTML/JavaScript 
payloads which would later be rendered and executed in the browser of 
any user visiting the affected profile page (user.html). 







This issue affects Vulnerability-Lookup before 2.18.0. | Severity UNKNOWN  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 13:15:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-42620</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-42620</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>N’utilisez plus ce vélo électrique vendu par Decathlon et Nature  Découvertes  un défaut le rend dangereux, un rappel est en cours</title>
      <description>![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5">
div>AddBike lance une campagne de rappel visant l’ensemble des vélos cargo U-Cargo équipés d’une fourche rigide, commercialisés en France depuis 2020. Cette procédure fait suite à la détection d’un possible défaut de fabrication au niveau du cintrage des fourreaux de fourche, susceptible d’entraîner un risque de blessure pour l’utilisateur./div>
/div>]]>  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 12:54:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//www.frandroid.com/survoltes/velo-electrique/2902011_nutilisez-plus-ce-velo-electrique-vendu-par-decathlon-et-nature-decouvertes-un-defaut-le-rend-dangereux-un-rappel-est-en-cours</link>
      <guid>https://www.frandroid.com/survoltes/velo-electrique/2902011_nutilisez-plus-ce-velo-electrique-vendu-par-decathlon-et-nature-decouvertes-un-defaut-le-rend-dangereux-un-rappel-est-en-cours</guid><category><![CDATA[Survoltés]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Vélos électriques]]></category>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>Voici la meilleure façon d’utiliser Google Agenda sur Windows 11</title>
      <description>![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5">
div>Astral permet aux utilisateurs sur Windows d'avoir accès à une application native pour gérer leur Google Agenda. Avec sa nouvelle version, l'application prend en charge le multicomptes et dévoile des options de visioconférences.   /div>
/div>]]>  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 13:15:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//www.frandroid.com/marques/microsoft/2901795_voici-la-meilleure-facon-dutiliser-google-agenda-sur-windows-11</link>
      <guid>https://www.frandroid.com/marques/microsoft/2901795_voici-la-meilleure-facon-dutiliser-google-agenda-sur-windows-11</guid><category><![CDATA[Marques]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Microsoft]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[OS]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[PC]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Produits]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Windows]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Google Agenda]]></category>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>Rachat de Warner Bros.  Netflix assure que « rien ne change »… pour l’instant</title>
      <description>![CDATA[
Dans un mail envoyé à ses abonnés le 7 décembre 2025, Netflix a tenté de rassurer après l'annonce du rachat de Warner Bros. Si la société indique que « rien ne change aujourd'hui », cela pourrait bien finir par changer à terme. 
]]>  </description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 08 Dec 2025 13:09:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//www.numerama.com/tech/2136801-rachat-de-warner-bros-netflix-assure-que-rien-ne-change-pour-linstant.html</link>
      <guid>https://www.numerama.com/tech/2136801-rachat-de-warner-bros-netflix-assure-que-rien-ne-change-pour-linstant.html</guid><category><![CDATA[Streaming]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Tech]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[HBO]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[HBO Max]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Netflix]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix]]></category>
<category><![CDATA[Warner Bros.]]></category>
    </item>
